status: Partially recognized state, Recognized by 41 UN member states
footnote_c: 612,000  is the estimate given for the population of Western Sahara based on UN projection growth since 1975, the date when the last census took place in Western Sahara. excluding 100,000 the estimated number of people living in the Tindouf refugee camps in Algeria where the SADR is headquartered.
footnote_d: 75% to 80% of the claimed territory is de facto under Moroccan administration.
footnote_e: TLD of .eh is reserved for Western Sahara but not yet granted to any claimant.
